authorblurb.para: As Senior Software Engineer at JBoss, a Division of Red Hat, Andrew Lee Rubinger is primarily responsible for development of the company's EJB 3.x implementation. He was an early adopter of Java EE technologies and an active contributor in the tech community.

Aslak Knutsen, the project lead of Arquillian, is a Senior Software Engineer at JBoss, by Red Hat. He’s involved in projects such as Arquillian, ShrinkWrap, Weld, and Seam 3, one of the founders of the JBoss Testing initiative, and a speaker at major industry conferences including Devoxx, JavaOne, Jazoon, JFokus, and Geecon.
